articles.description: The Perth Scorchers have been docked a point by Cricket Australia after being found guilty of breaching the Big Bash League’s contracting rules earlier this month.
articles.content:
The Perth Scorchers have been docked a point by Cricket Australia after being found guilty of breaching the Big Bash Leagues contracting rules earlier this month.
Coach Adam Voges was forced to scra… [+2023 chars]

articles.title: New Zealand’s white ball series in Australia postponed due to Covid protocols - The Guardian
articles.description: New Zealand’s limited-overs tour of Australia has been postponed indefinitely due to uncertainty over when the visitors would be able to return home due to Covid-19 protocols
articles.content:

articles.title: 2022 Women's Asian Cup: Five stories to watch as Matildas embark on title charge - ABC News
articles.description: While the Matildas will absorb most of Australia's attention during the Women's Asian Cup, there will be a number of other fascinating storylines unfolding.
